S06pplg1__u:1_0: [LPG_1r] siddhaṃ namaḥ sarvajñāya evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasamaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati
S06pplg1__u:1_1: sma gṛdhrākūṭaparvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ paṃcamātrair bhikṣusahasraiḥ
S06pplg1__u:1_2: sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair
S06pplg1__u:1_3: ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ
S06pplg1__u:1_5: ekapudgalaṃ sthāpayitvā yad utāyuṣmantam ānandam* śaikṣaṃ srotāpannaṃ paṃcamātraiś
S06pplg1__u:1_6: ca bhikṣuṇīśatair yaśodharāmahāprajāpatīpramukhaiḥ saṃbahulaiś copāsakair upāsikābhiś
S06pplg1__u:1_7: ca sarvair dṛṣṭadharmabhiḥ mahatā ca bodhisatvasaṃghena sārdham aprameyāsaṃkhyeyair
S06pplg1__u:1_8: bodhisatvair mahāsatvaiḥ sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ samādhipratilabdhaiḥ śunyatāvihāribhir
S06pplg1__u:1_11: ādeyavacanair akusīdair ārabdhavīryaiḥ kāyajīvitanirapekṣair akuhakair alapakair
S06pplg1__u:37_0: maitreyeṇa ca bodhisatvena mahāsatvena etaiś cānyaiś cānekair bodhisatvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ
S06pplg1__u:37_1: atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ svayam eva siṃhāsanaṃ prajñapya nyaṣīdat paryaṃkam
S06pplg1__u:37_2: ābhujya ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtim upasthāpya tatra niṣadya samādhirājo
S06pplg1__u:37_3: nāma samādhiṃ samāpanno 'bhūt* yatra samādhau sarvasamādhayo 'ntargatā anupraviṣṭāḥ
S06pplg1__u:38: atha bhagavāṃ smṛtaḥ saṃprajānaṃs tataḥ samādher vyutthāya divyena cakṣuṣedaṃ buddhakṣetraṃ vyavalokayati sma /
S06pplg1__u:39: vyavalokya sarvakāyāt prabhāṃ prāmuñcat* tasyādhastāt padatalayoḥ sahasrārābhyāṃ cakrābhyāṃ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭiraśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma :
S06pplg1__u:40: daśabhyaś ca pādāṃgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /
S06pplg1__u:41_0: evaṃ dvābhyāṃ gulphābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ jaṃghābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ dvābhyām ūrubhyām*
S06pplg1__u:41_1: kaṭer nābhimaṇḍalāt* dvābhyāṃ pārśvābhyām* hṛdaye śrīvatsāt mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāt* saṣṭiṣaṣṭī
S06pplg1__u:42: daśabhyo hastāṅgulibhyaḥ ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaraṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:43_0: evan dvābhyāṃ bāhubhyām* dvābhyām āṃsābhyām* grīvāyāś catasṛbhyo [LPG_2v] daṃṣṭrābhyaś
S06pplg1__u:43_1: catvāriṃśato dantebhyaḥ dvābhyāṃ cakṣubhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ śrotrābhyām* dvābhyāṃ ghrāṇapuṭebhyām*
S06pplg1__u:43_2: madhye bhruvorṇāyā upariṣṭād uṣṇīṣāt* mukhadvārāc ca ṣaṣṭiṣaṣṭī raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaraṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:44_0: sarvāṇi ca tāni raśmikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi sarvāvantam imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06pplg1__u:44_1: lokadhātuṃ mahatāvabhāsena spharitvā pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn
S06pplg1__u:45: evan dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samaṃtād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamān lokadhātūn mahatāvabhāsena spharanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:46: yaiś ca satvaiḥ so 'vabhāso dṛṣṭo ye ca tena raśmyavabhāsena spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06pplg1__u:47_0: atha bhagavān punar eva sarvaromakūpebhyaḥ prabhāṃ prāmuṃcat* yayā prabhayāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro
S06pplg1__u:47_1: lokadhātur mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭo 'bhūt* pūrvasyāṃ ca diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātavo
S06pplg1__u:47_2: mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭā abhūvan* evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād
S06pplg1__u:47_3: upariṣṭāt* yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātavo
S06pplg1__u:47_4: mahatāvabhāsena sphuṭā abhūvan* yaiś ca satvaiḥ so 'vabhāso dṛṣṭo ye ca tenāvabhāsena
S06pplg1__u:47_5: spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06pplg1__u:48: atha bhagavān punar api yā sā tathāgatasya prakṛtiprabhā tayā prabhayemaṃ [LPG_3r] trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ mahatāvabhāsena spharati sma /
S06pplg1__u:49: pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn mahatāvabhāsena spharati sma /
S06pplg1__u:50: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭāt* yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātuṃs tena mahatāvabhāsena spharati sma /
S06pplg1__u:51: yaiś ca satvaiḥ so 'vabhāso dṛṣṭo ye ca tenāvabhāsena spṛṣṭās te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06pplg1__u:52_0: atha bhagavān mukhadvārāj jihvendriyaṃ nirṇamayya sarvāvantam imaṃ tṛsāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06pplg1__u:52_1: lokadhātuṃ jihvendriyeṇa spharitvā smitaṃ prādurakārṣīt* tataś ca jihvendriyād anekāni
S06pplg1__u:53: sarvatra ca raśmyāṃ nānāratnamayāni suvarṇanirbhāsāni sahasrapatrāṇi padmāni santiṣṭhante sma /
S06pplg1__u:57: tatra ca padmeṣu tathāgatavigrahā niṣaṇṇā dharman deśayaṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:58: yad utemām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān dharmadeśanāṃ te pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn gacchanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:60_0: yad utemām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān dharmadeśanām* evaṃ dakṣiṇasyān diśi paścimāyām
S06pplg1__u:60_1: uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl
S06pplg1__u:62: yad utemām eva ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān dharmadeśanām* yaiś ca satvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutas te sarve niyatā abhavann anuttarasyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06pplg1__u:63: atha bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ siṃhavikrīḍitaṃ nāma buddhasamādhiṃ samāpadya tathārūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskaroti sma /
S06pplg1__u:64: yathārūpeṇardhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhisaṃskṛtenāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ [LPG_3v] ṣaḍvikāram akaṃpata prākaṃpata saṃprākaṃpata /
S06pplg1__u:65_0: avedhat* prāvedhat* saṃprāvedhat* acalat prācalat saṃprācalat* akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat
S06pplg1__u:65_1: saṃprākṣubhyat* agarjat prāgarjat saṃprāgarjat* araṇat prāraṇat saṃprāraṇat* anteṣūnnamati sma /
S06pplg1__u:67: madhya aunnamati smānteṣv avanamati sma / mṛdukaḥ
S06pplg1__u:68_0: snigdhaḥ sūkṣmaḥ sarvasukhasaṃjanano 'bhūt* atha tena kṣaṇalavamuhūrtena yāvanto
S06pplg1__u:68_2: te sarve samucchinnā abhūvan* sarve ca te satvā manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyai upapannā
S06pplg1__u:68_3: abhūvan* cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ ca devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ yāmānāṃ tuṣitānāṃ nirmāṇaratīnāṃ
S06pplg1__u:68_4: paranirmitavaśavartināṃ devānāṃ sahabhāgatāyai upapannā abhūvan* atha te manuṣyās
S06pplg1__u:68_5: te ca devās tenaiva prītiprasādaprāmodyena paurvikīṃ jātiṃ samanusmaraṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:69: samanusmṛtya prītiprasādaprāmodyapratilabdhā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntā upasaṃkramya prāṃjalībhūtā bhagavantaṃ namasyanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:70_0: evaṃ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām
S06pplg1__u:70_1: adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukāsameṣu
S06pplg1__u:70_2: lokadhātuṣu sarvanarakāḥ sarvatiryagyonayaḥ sarvayamalokā samucchinnāḥ sarvākṣaṇāś
S06pplg1__u:70_3: cāstamitā abhūvan* sarve ca te satvā manuṣyāṇāṃ sahabhāgatāyai upapadyante sma /
S06pplg1__u:71: atha te manuṣyās te ca devās tenaiva prītiprasādaprāmodyena paurvikīṃ jātiṃ samanusmaraṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:72_0: samanusmṛtya prītiprasādaprāmodyapratilabdhāḥ svakasvakeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ye tatra
S06pplg1__u:72_1: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhās tiṣṭhanti tān upasaṃkramanti smopasaṃkramya prāṃjalībhūtās
S06pplg1__u:72_2: tāṃs tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān namasyanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:73: atha tena kṣaṇena ye 'smiṃs [LPG_4r] trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau jātyandhāḥ satvās te 'pi sarve cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi paśyanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:81_0: rogaspṛṣṭā vigatarogā abhūvan* vikalendriyāḥ paripūrṇendriyā abhūvan* klāntakāyā
S06pplg1__u:81_1: aklāntakāyā abhūvan* avirahitākuśalakāyavāṅmanaskarmantājīvā vigatākuśalakāyavāṅmanaskarmantājīvā bhavanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:82_0: sarvasatvāś ca sarvasatveṣu samacittā abhūvan* yad uta mātāpitṛbhrātṛbhaginīsamacittāḥ
S06pplg1__u:82_2: śucayo nirāmagandhāḥ sarvākuśalavitarkavigatāḥ sarvasatvās tasmin samaye sarvasukhasamarpitā
S06pplg1__u:82_3: abhūvan* evaṃrūpeṇa sukhena samanvāgatās tadyathā tṛtīyadhyānasamāpannasya bhikṣoḥ
S06pplg1__u:82_4: sukhaṃ sarvasatvāś ca tasmin samaye evaṃrūpayā prajñayā samanvāgatā abhūvan* yad evaṃ jānaṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:83: sādhu dānaṃ sādhu damaḥ sādhu saṃyamaḥ sādhu satyam /
S06pplg1__u:84: sādhv apramādaḥ sādhu maitrī sādhu karuṇā sādhv avihiṃsā prāṇibhūteṣu /
S06pplg1__u:85_0: atha bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇa imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ
S06pplg1__u:85_1: sasumeruṃ sacakravāḍaṃ sadevabhavanaṃ sendrakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ savaśavartinaṃ saśuddhāvāsaṃ
S06pplg1__u:85_2: sadevadānavakāyam abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virājate ābhayā varṇena tejasā śṛyā :
S06pplg1__u:86_0: tadyathāpi nāma balavān divākaraḥ pariśuddhe gaganatale paurṇamāsyāṃ vā candramaṇḍalam*
S06pplg1__u:86_1: evam eva bhagavān pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn abhibhūya dakṣiṇasyāṃ
S06pplg1__u:86_2: paścimāyām uttarasyām [LPG_4v] adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl
S06pplg1__u:86_3: lokadhātūn abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate ābhayā varṇena tejasā
S06pplg1__u:86_4: śriyā tadyathāpi nāma sumeruḥ parvatarājaḥ sarvāṃs tadanyān parvatān abhibhūya sthitaḥ
S06pplg1__u:87: tadyathāpi nāma candramaṇḍalam* sarvāṇi tārārūpāṇy abhibhūya sthitaṃ śobhate bhāsati tapati virocate /
S06pplg1__u:88: tadyathāpi nāma sūryamaṇḍalaṃ sarvāṃs tadanyān avabhāsān abhibhūya sthitaṃ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate /
S06pplg1__u:89: evam eva bhagavān daśasu dikṣu sadevakaṃ sendrakaṃ samārakaṃ sabrahmakaṃ saśuddhāvāsam abhibhūya sthitaḥ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate ābhayā varṇena tejasā śṛyā :
S06pplg1__u:90: punar yādṛśaṃ bhagavataḥ prakṛtyātmabhāvopadarśanaṃ tādṛśam iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātāv upadarśayati sma /
S06pplg1__u:91_0: atha yāvanto 'smiṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau śuddhāvāsakāyikā devanikāyāḥ
S06pplg1__u:91_1: yāvad brahmakāyikā paranirmitavaśavartinaḥ nirmāṇaratayaḥ tuṣitā yāmās trāyastriṃśāś
S06pplg1__u:91_2: cāturmahārājakāyikā devanikāyās te sarve siṃhāsananiṣaṇṇaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:92_0: te tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā divyāni puṣpāṇy ādāya
S06pplg1__u:92_1: divyāni mālyāni divyān gandhān divyāni vilepanāni divyāni cūrṇāni divyān vāsān divyāny
S06pplg1__u:95: divyāni cchatrāṇi divyāṃ dhvajān* divyāḥ patākā gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāmanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:96: upasaṃkramya taiḥ puṣpādibhir yāvac chatradhvajapatākābhir bhagavantam avakiranti smābhyavakiranti
S06pplg1__u:98: ye ceha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau manuṣyā vineyā bhājanībhūtās te jalajasthalajāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkramya tathāgatam abhipūjayaṃti sma /
S06pplg1__u:99: [LPG_5r] sarvāṇi ca tāni puṣpādīni yāvac chatradhvajapatākā bhagavaty avakīrṇāni /
S06pplg1__u:100_1: upari vaihāyase mūrdhasandhau mahāpuṣpādikūṭāgāraḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt* tataś ca kūṭāgārād
S06pplg1__u:100_2: divyāni puṣpapaṭṭadāmāni pralaṃbante sma pralaṃbante smābhipralaṃbante sma /
S06pplg1__u:101: taiś ca puṣpapaṭṭadāmābhir ayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātus tena ca suvarṇavarṇena bhagavataḥ prabhāvabhāsenātyarthaṃ śobhate bhāsate tapati virocate /
S06pplg1__u:102_0: yathā cāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur evaṃ pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl
S06pplg1__u:102_1: lokadhātavo 'vabhāsitāḥ sphuṭāś cābhūvan* evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām
S06pplg1__u:102_2: adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu lokadhātavo 'vabhāsitāḥ spuṭāś cābhūvan*
S06pplg1__u:102_3: tatra jāṃbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ tathāgatasyāsecanakadarśanam atmabhāvan dṛṣṭvaivam
S06pplg1__u:102_4: abhavat* asmākaṃ purataḥ tathāgato niṣaṇṇo dharman deśayatīti /
S06pplg1__u:103_0: yathā jāṃbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇām evaṃ godānīyānāṃ pūrvavidehakānām uttarakauravāṇāṃ
S06pplg1__u:103_1: cāturmahārajakāyikānāṃ devānāṃ yāvad aghaniṣṭhānān devānāṃ evaṃ sāhasre lokadhātau
S06pplg1__u:103_2: dvisāhasre trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasatvānām etad abhūt* asmākaṃ puratas
S06pplg1__u:104_0: atha bhagavāṃs tasminn eva siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ punar eva prabhāṃ prāmuṃcat* yayā prabhayā
S06pplg1__u:104_1: punar evāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur avabhāsito 'bhūt* yenāvabhāsena ya
S06pplg1__u:104_2: iha trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
S06pplg1__u:104_3: lokadhātuṣu tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān saśrāvakasaṃghān paśyanti sma /
S06pplg1__u:105_0: tatra ca pūrvasyān diśi ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās te 'pīmaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ
S06pplg1__u:105_1: lokadhātuṃ bhagavantaṃ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ sabhikṣusaṃghaparivāram adrākṣur
S06pplg1__u:105_2: yathā ca pūrvasyān diśy evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ [LPG_5v] paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād
S06pplg1__u:105_3: upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣu ye gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu satvās
S06pplg1__u:105_4: te 'pīmaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ bhagavantaṃ ca śākyamuniṃ tathāgataṃ
S06pplg1__u:106_0: atha pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopamāl lokadhātūn atikramya yā sarvapaścimā lokadhātū
S06pplg1__u:106_1: ratnāvatī nāma tatra ratnākaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhas tiṣṭhati dhṛyate
S06pplg1__u:106_2: yāpayati sa imām eva prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ saṃprakāśayati /
S06pplg1__u:107_0: atha tatra lokadhātau samantaraśmir nāma bodhisatvo mahāsatvas taṃ mahāntam avabhāsaṃ

S06pplg1__u:252_1: dadatā evaṃ śikṣitavyam* yad evaṃ dānaṃ datvā mahāphalaṃ bhavaty evaṃ dānaṃ datvā
S06pplg1__u:255: evaṃ dānaṃ datvā tad eva dānaṃ niśrāya cāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣūpapadyate /
S06pplg1__u:256: evaṃ trāyastriṃśeṣu yāmeṣu tuṣiteṣu nirmāṇaratiṣu paranirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣūpapadyate /
S06pplg1__u:257: evaṃ dānaṃ datvā tad evaṃ dānaṃ niśrāya prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate dvitīyaṃ tritīyaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam utpādyate ākāśānaṃtyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate /
S06pplg1__u:258: vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattim ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpattiṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate evaṃ dānaṃ datvāryāṣṭāṃgo mārga utpādyate /
S06pplg1__u:263: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caraṃ jānāty evam upāyakauśalyena dānaṃ dattaṃ dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayati /
S06pplg1__u:264: evaṃ śīlapāramitāṃ kṣāntipāramitāṃ vīryapāramitāṃ dhyānapāramitāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paripūrayati /
S06pplg1__u:265: athāyuṣmāṃc chāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat* kathaṃ bhagavaṃ bodhisatvena mahāsatvena dānaṃ dadatā dānapāramitā paripūritā bhavati /

S06pplg1__u:469_1: iti vā vaktavyaḥ tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi sa na rūpaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:470: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ yuktam iti vā ayuktam iti vā samanupaśyati /

S06pplg1__u:473: na rūpaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:474: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ saṃkleśadharmi vā vyavadānadharmi vā samanupaśyati /

S06pplg1__u:539: evaṃ hi yuktaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ [LPG_23r] prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:540: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carann evaṃ yujyate yathā yujyamāno na sarvajñatām atītena yojayati tathā hy atītam eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:544: tathā hy anāgatam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan kathaṃ sarvajñatām anāgatena yojayiṣyati /
S06pplg1__u:546: tathā hi pratyutpannam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan kathaṃ sarvajñatāṃ pratyutpannena yojayiṣyati /
S06pplg1__u:547: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:548_0: punar aparaṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ
S06pplg1__u:548_1: sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan
S06pplg1__u:550: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:551: tathā hi vijñānam eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:552: yāvan na cakṣuḥ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:553: tathā hi cakṣur eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:554: evan na śrotraṃ na ghrāṇaṃ na jihvāṃ na kāyan na manaḥ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:555: tathā hi mana eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:556: evaṃ na rūpaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:557: tathā hi rūpam eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:558: evaṃ na śabdagandharasasparśadharmān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:559: tathā hi dharmān eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:560: evaṃ na skandhān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:561: [LPG_23v] tathā hi skandhān eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:562: na dhātūn sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:563: tathā hi dhātūn eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:565: tathā hy āyatanāny eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:567: na cakṣurdhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:568: tathā hi cakṣurdhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:570: na rūpadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:571: tathā hi rūpadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:572: na cakṣurvijñānadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:573: tathā hi cakṣurvijñānadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:574: yāvan na manodhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:575: tathā hi manodhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:576: na dharmadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:577: tathā hi dharmadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:578: na manovijñānadhātuṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:579: tathā hi manovijñānadhātum eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:581: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatiputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:582: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dānapāramitāṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:583: tathā hi dānapāramitām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:584: evaṃ na śīlapāramitāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāṃ na vīryapāramitāṃ na dhyānapāramitāṃ na prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:585: tathā hi prajñāpāramitām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:586: evaṃ na smṛtyupasthānāni na samyakprahāṇardhipādendriyabalabodhyaṃgamārgān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:587: evan na daśa tathāgatabalāni na catvāri vaiśāradyāni na catasraḥ pratisaṃvida [LPG_24r] nāṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:588: tathā hy āveṇikabuddhadharmān na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:589: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:590: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na buddhaṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:591: na sarvajñatāṃ buddhena yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:592: tathā hi buddham eva na samanupaśyati sarvajñatām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:593: na bodhiṃ sarvajñatayā yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:594: na boddhyā sarvajñatāṃ yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:595: tathā hi bodhim eva na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:596: sarvajñatām eva na samanupaśyaty asamanupaśyan na yojayati na viyojayati /
S06pplg1__u:597: evaṃ hi śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:598: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpaṃ bhāva iti yojayati na rūpaṃ vibhāva iti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:599: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ bhāva iti na vijñānaṃ vibhāva iti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:602: na rūpam anityam iti yojayati evan na vedanāṃ na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ nityam iti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:603: na vijñānam anityam iti yojayati na rūpaṃ sukham iti yojayati na rūpaṃ duḥkham iti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:604: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ sukham iti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:608: evaṃ na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam ātmeti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:612: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ śāntam iti [LPG_24v] yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:614: na rūpaṃ śunyam iti vā aśunyam iti yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:615: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ śunyam iti vā aśunyam iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:616: na rūpaṃ nimittam iti vā animittam iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:617: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ nimittam iti vā animittam iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:618: na rūpaṃ praṇihitam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:619: na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānaṃ praṇihitam iti vā apraṇihitam iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:620: na rūpam utpadyata iti vā nirudhyata iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:621: evaṃ na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam utpadyata iti vā nirudhyaya iti vā yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:624: na rūpaṃ pratyutpannam iti yujyate evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam atītam iti yujyate na vijñānam anāgatam iti yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:626: na rūpaṃ sāram iti na durbalam iti yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:627: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam sāram iti na durbalam iti yujyate /
S06pplg1__u:628: na rūpam astīti na nāstīti yujyate na viyujyate /
S06pplg1__u:629: evan na vedanān na saṃjñān na saṃskārān na vijñānam astīti na nāstīti yujyate na viyujyate /
S06pplg1__u:632: caratīti ca na carati ceti nopaiti /
S06pplg1__u:633: naiva carati ca na caratīti nopaiti /
S06pplg1__u:634: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:635: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:636: na dānapāramitāyā na śīlapāramitāyā na kṣāntipāramitāyā na vīryapāramitāyā na dhyānapāramitāyāḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:638: na satvaparipākahetoḥ na buddhakṣetrapariśodhanārthaṃ na daśānāṃ [LPG_25r] tathāgatabalānāṃ kṛte /
S06pplg1__u:641: nāṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:644: na śunyatāśunyatāyā na mahāśunyatāyā na paramārthaśunyatāyā na saṃskṛtaśunyatāyā nāsaṃskṛtaśunyatāyā nātyantaśunyatāyā /
S06pplg1__u:653: na dharmadhātor na bhūtakoṭeḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:654: tat kasya hetoḥ na hi bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kasyacid dharmasya bhedaṃ vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā viśeṣaṃ vā samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:655: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:656: sa na divyasya cakṣuṣaḥ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:657: na divyasya śrotrasya na paracittajñānasya na pūrvanivāsānusmṛter nardhipādānāṃ kṛte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:658: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:659_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ
S06pplg1__u:659_1: bhavaty aham ṛddhipādeṣu sthitvā divyena cakṣuṣā pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu
S06pplg1__u:659_2: lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tān satkariṣyāmi gurukariṣyāmi mānayiṣyāmi pūjayiṣyāmi //
S06pplg1__u:660_0: evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv
S06pplg1__u:660_1: ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tān satkariṣyāmi
S06pplg1__u:660_2: gurukariṣyāmi mānayiṣyāmi pūjayiṣyāmi na cāsyaivaṃ [LPG_25v] bhavati yat te buddhā
S06pplg1__u:660_3: bhagavanto bhāṣante tat sarvaṃ divyena śrotreṇa śroṣyāmi /
S06pplg1__u:661: ahaṃ tatra lokadhātuṣu satvānāṃ cetasaiva cittaṃ jñāsye /
S06pplg1__u:663: ahaṃ divyena cakṣuṣā tāṃ satvāṃś cyavamānān upapadyamānān upapannāṃś ca drakṣyāmi /
S06pplg1__u:666: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:667: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato māraḥ pāpīyān avatāraṃ na labhate /
S06pplg1__u:668: yāny api kānicil laukikalokottarāṇi karaṇīyāni tāny api sarvāṇi pradakṣiṇībhavanty anābhogenāparikalpitāni //
S06pplg1__u:669_0: ye ca te pūrvasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto ye ca
S06pplg1__u:669_1: dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyām adhastād upariṣṭād yāvat samantād daśasu dikṣv
S06pplg1__u:669_2: ekaikasyān diśi gaṃgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantas te 'pi buddhā
S06pplg1__u:669_3: bhagavantas taṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvam ārakṣanti mā śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā pated iti /
S06pplg1__u:670_0: ye ca catvāro mahārājā yāvad aghaniṣṭhā devās te 'pi taṃ bodhisatvaṃ mahāsatvamm
S06pplg1__u:670_1: ārakṣanti mā haiva kaścid bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasyāntarāyaṃ kārṣīt* ye ca kecit
S06pplg1__u:670_2: kāyikā rogās te 'pi tasya dṛṣṭe 'pi dharme sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhavanti /
S06pplg1__u:671: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ sarvasatvān maitryā spharati /
S06pplg1__u:673: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:674: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ alpakṛcchreṇa dhāraṇīmukha samādhimukhāni pratibhānapratisaṃvinmukhāny āmukhībhavanti /
S06pplg1__u:676: taiś ca buddhair bhagavadbhir na kadācid virahito bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:678: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati /
S06pplg1__u:679: asti kaścid dharmo yo dharmaiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃyujyate vā visaṃyujyate vā /
S06pplg1__u:682: tathā hi sa tad dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:685: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:686_0: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ
S06pplg1__u:686_1: bhavati * kaccid ahaṃ dharmadhātum abhisaṃbuddhyeya na vābhisaṃbudhyeya tat kasya
S06pplg1__u:686_2: hetor na hi dharmadhātum abhisaṃbuddho nābhisaṃbudhyate /
S06pplg1__u:688: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:689: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na kaṃcid dharmaṃ dharmadhātuvyatiriktaṃ samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:690: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:691: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na dharmadhātor dharmāṇāṃ ca nānākaraṇaṃ karoti / //
S06pplg1__u:692: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati //
S06pplg1__u:693: dharmadhātuṃ pratividhyeya vā na vā pratividhyeya /
S06pplg1__u:694: tathā hi sa na kaṃcid dharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:695: yena dharmeṇa yo dharmaḥ pratividhyeta tathā hi na sa dharmadhātuṃ śunyam iti yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:697: evaṃ khalu śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran yukta iti vaktavyaḥ //
S06pplg1__u:698: [LPG_26v] punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na cakṣurdhātuṃ śunyatayā yojayati /
S06pplg1__u:704: evaṃ na śrotradhātuṃ na śabdadhātuṃ na śrotravijñānadhātuṃ na ghrāṇadhātuṃ na gandhadhātuṃ na ghrāṇavijñānadhātuṃ na jihvādhātuṃ na rasadhātuṃ na jihvāvijñānadhātum /
S06pplg1__u:713: eṣa hi śāradvatīputra paramo yogo yad uta śunyatāyogaḥ śunyatāyāṃ śāradvatīputra caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā patati /
S06pplg1__u:716: kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate ye kecic chāradvatīputra yogāḥ prajñāpāramitāyogas teṣām agrya-m-ākhyāyate /
S06pplg1__u:717: śreṣṭha varaḥ pravaraḥ praṇīta-m-ākhyāyate tat kasya hetoḥ anuttara eṣa yogo yad uta prajñāpāramitāyogaḥ śunyatānimittāpraṇihitayoga /
S06pplg1__u:718_0: evaṃ yujyamānaḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vyākṛto vaktavyaḥ asannibhūtaś
S06pplg1__u:718_1: cānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ evaṃ yujyamānaḥ [LPG_27r] śāradvatīputra bodhisatvo
S06pplg1__u:718_2: mahāsatvo 'prameyāṇām asaṃkhyeyānāṃ satvānāmm arthaṃ karoti na cāsyaivaṃ bhavaty
S06pplg1__u:718_3: ahaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yujye 'ti vā viyujye 'ti vā māṃ buddhā bhagavanto vyākariṣyanty
S06pplg1__u:720: aham anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayiṣye /
S06pplg1__u:722: tat kasya hetos tathā hi sa dharmadhātuṃ na vyatirekīkaroti /
S06pplg1__u:724: na ca dharmadhātoḥ kaṃcid anyadharmaṃ samanupaśyati /
S06pplg1__u:725: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cared yo vā buddhair bhagavadbhir vyākṛyeta /
S06pplg1__u:727: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hi tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na satvasaṃjñotpadyate /
S06pplg1__u:728: na jīvasaṃjñā na pudgalasaṃjñā na jānakapaśyakakārakavedakasaṃjñotpadyate /
S06pplg1__u:730: tat kasya hetoḥ tathā hy atyantaṃ satvo nopalabhyate na nirudhyate /
S06pplg1__u:731: na hi satvasyotpādo na nirodhaḥ yasya ca notpādo na nirodhaḥ kathaṃ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyati /
S06pplg1__u:732: evaṃ caraṃc chāradvatīputra bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ satvānutpādatayā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati /
S06pplg1__u:736_0: eṣa śāradvatīputra bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ paramo yogo yad uta śunyatāyogaḥ ayaṃ
S06pplg1__u:736_1: śāradvatīputra bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ paramo yogaḥ
S06pplg1__u:737: atra ca śāradvatīputra yoge caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo mahāmaitrīm abhinirharati /
S06pplg1__u:739: atra śāradvatīputra yoge caran bodhisatvo mahāsatvo na mātsaryacittam utpādayati /
S06pplg1__u:740: na dauḥśīlyacittaṃ na vyāpādacittaṃ na kausīdyacittaṃ [LPG_27v] na vikṣepacittaṃ na dauṣprajñacittam utpādayati /
